General.Name: Zhejiang Jiaao Enprotech
General.Description: Zhejiang Jiaao Enprotech Stock Co., Ltd focuses in biomass energy, environmental plasticizers, and environmental stabilizers business in China. The company provides its products for use in plastic toys, wires, cables, artificial leather, medical equipment, floor, and wall veneers, building materials, automobiles, and packaging sectors. Zhejiang Jiaao Enprotech Stock Co., Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Tongxiang, China.
